properties.entry: select p_no, p_title, address, p_call, p_status, tem_cate_no, p_score, location_no, p_select_num, rcategory_no from place ORDER BY 1
select p_no, p_title, address, p_call, p_status, tem_cate_no, p_score, location_no, p_select_num, rcategory_no from place where p_select_num = 1 ORDER BY 1
select p_no, p_title, address, p_call, p_status, tem_cate_no, p_score, location_no, p_select_num, rcategory_no from place where p_select_num = 2 ORDER BY 1

select p_no, p_title, address, p_call, p_status, tem_cate_name, p_score, location_name, p_select_num, businesstime, rcategory_name, a.tem_cate_no, a.location_no, a.rcategory_no from place a join thema_category b on a.tem_cate_no = b.tem_cate_no join area_category c on a.location_no = c.location_no left join r_category d on a.rcategory_no = d.rcategory_no where p_no = ?
insert into place( p_no, p_title, address, p_call, tem_cate_no, location_no, p_select_num, rcategory_no, businesstime ) values ( SEQ_PLACE.nextval, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
insert into attechment ( file_no, origin_name, change_name, file_path, file_level, place_no ) values ( seq_attachment.nextval, ?, ?, ?, ?, SEQ_PLACE.currval)
select file_no, origin_name, change_name, file_path, file_level from attechment where place_no = ?
update place set p_status ='N' where p_no= ?

where p_no = ?
